remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación para el [IStream](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa380034.aspx) y [ISequentialStream](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa380010.aspx) interfaces en MSDN Library.For more information, see the documentation for the [IStream](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa380034.aspx) and [ISequentialStream](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa380010.aspx) interfaces in the MSDN Library. Common language runtime produce una excepción cuando un método COM en código nativo devuelve un `HRESULT` distinto de `S_OK`.The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an `HRESULT` other than `S_OK`. Para obtener más información, consulte [Cómo: mapa HRESULT y excepciones](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

Public Sub Commit (grfCommitFlags As Integer)

param.name: grfCommitFlags
param.span: A value that controls how the changes for the stream object are committed.

span.span: A value that controls how the changes for the stream object are committed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IStream pstm, long cb, IntPtr pcbRead, IntPtr pcbWritten);

Public Sub CopyTo (pstm As IStream, cb As Long, pcbRead As IntPtr, pcbWritten As IntPtr)
public: void CopyTo(System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::IStream ^ pstm, long cb, IntPtr pcbRead, IntPtr pcbWritten);

param.name: pstm
param.span: A reference to the destination stream.

span.span: A reference to the destination stream.

param.name: cb
param.span: The number of bytes to copy from the source stream.

span.span: The number of bytes to copy from the source stream.

param.name: pcbRead
param.span: On successful return, contains the actual number of bytes read from the source.

span.span: On successful return, contains the actual number of bytes read from the source.

param.name: pcbWritten
param.span: On successful return, contains the actual number of bytes written to the destination.

span.span: On successful return, contains the actual number of bytes written to the destination.

summary.span: Copies a specified number of bytes from the current seek pointer in the stream to the current seek pointer in another stream.

span.span: Copies a specified number of bytes from the current seek pointer in the stream to the current seek pointer in another stream.

param.name: dlibMove
param.span: The displacement to add to dwOrigin.

span.span: The displacement to add to dwOrigin.

param.name: dwOrigin
param.span: The origin of the seek.

span.span: The origin of the seek.

param.span: The origin can be the beginning of the file, the current seek pointer, or the end of the file.

span.span: The origin can be the beginning of the file, the current seek pointer, or the end of the file.

param.name: plibNewPosition
param.span: On successful return, contains the offset of the seek pointer from the beginning of the stream.

span.span: On successful return, contains the offset of the seek pointer from the beginning of the stream.

summary.span: Changes the seek pointer to a new location relative to the beginning of the stream, to the end of the stream, or to the current seek pointer.
